resources.string: Dota 2 is a multiplayer online battle arena (MOBA) game which has two teams of five players complete to collectively destroy a large stucture defended by the opposing team known as \'Ancient\', whilst defending their own.

I lost my life. I lost my friends. I lost my girlfriend. I lost my personality. I forgot my hobbies. I forgot my studies. I forgot my manners. And finally, when I thought life would get better, I lost my family. GGWP 11/10 Would Pay Again.
best game in the galaxy, but you have to play with the worst species in the galaxy.
